New Records: Shubman Gill and Yashasvi Jaiswal formed the highest opening partnership of 165 runs for India in a T20I match
Key Match Events: India won the match by 9 wickets
Shubman Gill and Yashasvi Jaiswal stitched an opening stand of 165 runs
Pre-Game Insights: West Indies chose to bat first as it often offers an advantage on this pitch
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch stayed true throughout the match
West Indies had two notable partnerships but failed to capitalize on a bigger total
Others: The match levelled the series 2-2, setting up an exciting final game
